body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       With a little advance planning, you can make the most of your trip to Delaware & Lehigh National Heritage Corridor. Be sure to check out the contents of our website, especially the Things to Do, Things to Know Before You Come, and Directions. The answers to most visitor questions can be found here. If you can't find the information you are looking for, drop us an e-mail, write or call and we will be happy to help. Enjoy your visit.
title: Delaware & Lehigh National Heritage Corridor: Plan Your Visit
